participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, enjoys trying new foods and spending time with pets.
participant_1.background: I've one brother. I like tacos. I have three sisters. I love dogs.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, with a touch of humor and a passion for art.
participant_2.background: I've two grown children who never visit. I fantasize about taking over the world. I'm a 56 year old woman. I used to be a painter but now I am a housekeeper.
